text: Sérgio Cerqueira Barcelos (4 October 1943 – 8 February 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Democrats. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1991 to 2003. Barcelos was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Barcelos died in João Pessoa, Brazil from cardiac arrest caused by heart surgery on 8 February 2022, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Democrats (Brazil) politicians
title: Sérgio Barcelos
